title: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau - Wikipedia
snippet: Sophie Grégoire Trudeau (French pronunciation: [sɔfi ɡʁeɡwɑʁ]; born April 24, 1975) is a Canadian public speaker and retired television host. She married Justin Trudeau, the 23rd prime minister of Canada, in 2005; the couple separated in 2023.

title: All About Justin Trudeau's Estranged Wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau

title: Canada PM Justin Trudeau and wife Sophie separate
snippet: Canada's PM Justin Trudeau and his wife Sophie are separating after 18 years, following "meaningful and difficult conversations". The couple said they would remain "a close family with deep love and respect" in an Instagram post.

title: Canada Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, Separates From Wife, Sophie Grégoire - The New York Times
snippet: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of Canada announced on Wednesday that he and his wife, Sophie Grégoire Trudeau, had separated after 18 years of marriage.
